summary: A young reindeer who suffers from vertigo learns to overcome his fear, takes flying lessons from a clumsy flying squirrel and heads to the North pole to save a troubled Santa and his fleet of flying reindeer.
cast: Olli Jantunen|Hannu-Pekka Björkman|Vuokko Hovatta|Vesa Vierikko|Jussi Lampi|Risto Kaskilahti|Minttu Mustakallio|Juha Veijonen|Puntti Valtonen|Elina Knihtilä|Juulia Rönkkö|Tommi Korpela|Aarre Karén|Arttu Hämäläinen|Ilmari Huhtala|Mika Ala-Panula|Kari Hietalahti|Janus Hanski|Jussi Chydenius|Miia Nuutila|Markus Degerman|Werne Walla|Susa Saukko|Veikko Honkanen|Ingo Albrecht|Sabine Arnhold|Carly Baker|Detlef Bierstedt|Danna Davis|Patrick FitzSymons|Rainer Fritzsche|Peter Groeger|Karlo Hackenberger|Gary Hetzler|Hans Hohlbein|Michael Iwannek|Morgan Jones|Joachim Kaps|Heather Keegan|Jürgen Kluckert|Norm MacDonald|Andrew McMahon|Tim Moeseritz|Gavin Morgan|Aileen Mythen|Olaf Reichmann|Katharina Ritter|Emma Roberts|Dennis Schmidt-Foß|Tilo Schmitz|Barbara Schöneberger|Susan Slott|Alan Stanford|Pete Stefanov|Tiernan Surlis|Paul Tylak|Irina von Bentheim|Bernhard Völger|Thomas Wolff|Susan Zelouf
title: Nico, el reno que quería volar
